qmesh = 20 20 20
!write_rmsd = .TRUE.
read_rmsd = .TRUE.
path = -2 1 1
ne = 240

nqperpen = 5

dP = 0.005
q0 = 2.d0 -1.d0 -1.d0

lresfunc = .TRUE.
functype = "CNCS12"
